issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
{{FileInputFormat#listStatus}} is too slow file system cache is disabled. 

{{TokenCache#obtainTokensForNamenodesInternal}} for every filesystem instance {{Master.getMasterPrincipal(conf)}} is caled which reloads YarnConfiguration .
For fileInput with 1k file will reload YarnConfiguration 1k times.

{{Master.getMasterPrincipal(conf)}} can be passed for  {{obtainTokensForNamenodesInternal}} per filesystem call.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #14103 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/14103/])
